Who we are

Integrated Marketing Communication (IMC) Solutions

An Integrated Marketing Communications (IMC) company founded in 2013 and based in Nairobi Kenya

The company offers one-stop-shop brand marketing and communication solutions to diverse clients regardless of their size and experience. From one-man shows to local and international corporate companies, all of whom demand the highest results and service standards.

We are constantly striving to develop unique strategies for our clients that are relevant to shifts in consumer behaviour and technology changes

We regard ourselves as an extension of our clients business, nurturing mutual growth.

With an experienced team of dedicated staff whose combined creative inspiration and extensive technical experience has produced proven track record of successful solutions for all of our clients specific requirements
